## label_for(name[[value,] html_options])
Creates a label for tag
if no value is given then an attempt to labelize the name will be done. In most Cases this could be fine

	label_for("user_id")
	 
	 => 
	 
	<label for='user_id' >User</label>

	label_for("user_id", "id")
	 
	 => 
	 
	<label for='user_id' >id</label>
